title: China pledges more poverty relief, praised for global contributions (Beijing Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Beijing Municipal Government ) Chinese President Xi Jinping addresses the 2015 Global Poverty Reduction and Development Forum in Beijing, capital of China , Oct 16 , 2015. China's hard battle against poverty has not only benefited its
